metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11765 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in OpenEXR before 2.4.1. There is an off-by-one error in use of the ImfXdr.h read function by DwaCompressor::Classifier::Classifier, leading to an out-of-bounds read.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> possibly same commits as CVE-2020-11762, need to check

criterions.comment: openexr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
